programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2020 Ep26
programme.desc: Kemegahan panggung Indosiar dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia meskipun di tengah pandemik. Dianjurkan oleh hos terkenal Indonesia dan persembahan menakjubkan oleh pelbagai artis dan penyanyi.

programme.title: Sejadah Ep4
programme.desc: Sejadah (Sehat Jadi Ibadah) adalah program yang akan memberikan maklumat mengenai kesihatan dari perspektif perubatan dan aspek lain. Dihoskan oleh pakar kesihatan Dr Cahyono, Sp.Naturophaty dan Ustadz Solmed.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep33
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep84
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Jalan Terjal Kakek Penjual Labu Keliling Yang Ingin Menunaikan Ibadah Umroh
programme.desc: Walaupun sudah tua, ini tidak mematahkan semangat Umar untuk terus bersusah payah mencari rezeki. Tambahan pula, dia berniat untuk menunaikan umrah. Bagaimanapun, dia menghadapi beberapa cabaran.

programme.title: Festival Ramadan 2022 Ep7
programme.desc: Keseronokan pencarian bakat memberi warna pada bulan yang penuh barakah ini! Kami bawakan kepada anda Qasidah, Marawis, dan pelbagai keunikan dan hiburan.

programme.title: Barakallah Ep24
programme.desc: Barakallah merupakan program tausiah yang dibimbing oleh Abdel Achrian bersama Ustaz Solmed dan Ustaz Taufiqurrahman yang akan memfokuskan kepada membincangkan permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat hingga kepada masalah kehidupan rumah tangga

programme.title: Lucunya Tuh Disini Ramadhan Tuh Di Hati Ep2
programme.desc: Menyambut bulan Ramadhan, dengan para komedian dari Stand Up Comedy Academy dan para juri berkumpul di bawah satu pentas yang sama untuk menghiburkan kita semua. Dimeriahkan oleh Jraim Laode, Maria Vania, Jarwo Kwat, Mamat Alkatiri, Raditya Dika dan lain-lain.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: Elite attorney Kang Seong-Hee goes up against a top prosecutor over a case involving a man accused of killing his wife.

programme.title: Don'T Go Too Far
programme.desc: While arguing on the division of their father's ₩2B inheritance, the eldest brother received a call to realize his son was kidnapped, and the ransom demanded was ₩2B...

programme.title: How To Steal A Dog
programme.desc: As the family goes bankrupt, Jiso decided to steal dog from wealthy family and return it for the reward money. Will her plan be successful?

programme.title: Perfect Proposal
programme.desc: A young woman conspires with a casino employee to swindle a businessman out of his fortune.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: 4 years after the events of Garibong district round up operation, Geumcheon Police’s Major Crimes Unit is given a mission to repatriate a fugitive who fled to Vietnam.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: The Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to take care of a case gone sideways.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: The Thieves
programme.desc: Korean and Hong Kong thieves team up to heist a $20M worth diamond, while everyone has their own agenda to keep the diamond for themselves.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: "Operation Chromite" tells the true story of a General, who led the attack against the North Koreans in the Battle of Incheon, forcing them to retreat out of Seoul.

programme.title: Steel Rain: Summit
programme.desc: A peace summit for Korea is derailed when the leaders of South Korea, North Korea and the U.S. are abducted by North Korean hardliners and held hostage in a submarine.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Lover's Concerto
programme.desc: Anonymous love letters keep coming to Ji-hwan, refreshing his memories 5 years ago of two long-lost best friends, but when love rushed in, who will be left behind?

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Me And Me
programme.desc: When a detective heads to a rural village to investigate the mysterious death of a couple, he finds himself in an inexplicable situation where his life is completely reversed.

programme.title: Cafe Midnight
programme.desc: Yoon went searching for her groom Taeyoung who didn't show up on the wedding day. She arrives at a strange place called 'Cafe Midnight' by chance and found a younger Taeyoung from the past.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A once legendary gangster Dong-chul tries to settle down to enjoy an ordinary life with his wife, but things get hard when he continuously gets tricked into making bad business decisions.

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A man commits an unethical act in an attempt to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: The Roundup

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: The Missing Vip

programme.title: Voice Of A Murderer
programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. There is a veteran cop and his special task force assigned to this case, but there is an indication the kidnapper is aware of their presence.

programme.title: Monster
programme.desc: With her sister murdered in cold blood, she goes after the killer for revenge, not knowing she's a target herself

programme.title: The Whispering
programme.desc: A woman and her boyfriend are among a group of students who are on a trip to celebrate their graduation. They wander into an abandoned amusement park and discover the "House of Horrors".

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: Be With You

programme.desc: Ada Choi, Athena Chu, Monica Chan, and Catherine Hung, who are being friends for 30 years, work as partners to operate a restaurant together. programme.title: An Exciting Offer Season 4 Ep21
programme.desc: The reality show of this season is to focus 10 young architectural interns to work in Beijing Institute of Architectural Design for a month. programme.title: Strawberryman Ep2

programme.title: The Talent Ep4
programme.desc: The program setting is based on eight concepts while the teenagers would have to use creative thinking to stimulate their imagination and use paper and pen, as well as programming, to solve different problems. programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10031004
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45784579
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45794580
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2013
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3575
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2600
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep387
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2015
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-West Eyes to the East (M) (Repeat) Ep8
programme.desc: "iWalker - West Eyes to the East" followed the host, Rifat who is a foreigner that traveled abroad, leading the audience to experience Taiwan, which has never been seen before.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughter’s diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boy’s dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wang’s which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves “The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real “Chosen Sleuth” instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: A high school student gets pregnant and is forced to have an abortion. When she dies from the operation, she returns as a ghost to haunt the apartment complex that she used to live

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the “midnight gymnasium” programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: The Grandmaster of Kungfu
programme.desc: The Eight-Nation Alliance dare not invade Tianjin as it is the homeland of martial arts. To conquer the city, Japan sends its top martial arts master to open a new academy challenging all Chinese masters. Huo Yuan Jia rises to fight, leading the other masters to resist the Japanese and defend the country.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Just when Joey looks forward to a brand new life after a failed suicide attempt, she finds herself pregnant but dared not to tell her ex-boyfriend. As she often feels stalked by a mysterious woman, Joey becomes delusional and emotionally unstable. Take the advice of a monastery host, she decides to unveil the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb…

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons – a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: Xin Lan takes over her father’s MMA club which is heavily in debt due to poor business. After He Hua defeated Xin Lan, she replaces her to become the new top MMA Diva and challenges Xin Lan’s MMA club to a duel. As Xin Lan is injured, she seeks help from a retried MMA superstar to fight the battle on her behalf to reclaim the club’s and her honour.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Special agent Nick (Daniel Wu), an undercover in the heart of Asia's lucrative heroin trade, is a Protégé to drug lord Quin (Andy Lau). In 8 years he eventually gains his trust and next in line to take over from his ill mentor. While Quin's health is going downhill, he plans to retire and unveils all his business secrets to Nick. When Nick infiltrates the syndicate to get enough evidence to arrest Quin, the unwritten law of brotherhood blurs with his professional duties. Nick finds himself corrupted by the easy money and his new found power. Unable to separate himself from his undercover identity, he is confused in moral dilemmas between justice, loyalty and true feeling from his soul in this illicit business.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other’s parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents’ first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: A dutiful police Dave, saves the life of a gang leader, Lin. When Lin commits another crime, Dave regrets his action and suffers from a severe mental disorder at the same time. He becomes a fugitive wanted for murder and tries to destroy Lin and his gang so as to restore his reputation as a good police officer.

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers’ claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: Till The End Of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld King’s sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: Ling Hu Chong, a Huashan clan’s disciple, is assigned to find the successor to the score “The Proud One”. Ling identifies Ying for the score but finds out that she is the daughter of the evil clan’s leader. At the same time, he is unwittingly dragged into an epic power struggle between clans, with complicated allegiances and perplexing moralities.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon’s clutches.

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: After spending fifteen years in prison on trumped-up charges for drug smuggling, the martial arts master Teng Piao embarks on a journey to take revenge on the person who sets him up - “Black Leopard”. Unfortunately for Piao, no one knows the real identity of “Black Leopard”, except that there is a black leopard tattoo on his chest.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls’ high school, is stuck with a baby that isn’t his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Li’s wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Li’s Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mother’s death – a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: The Mirror And The Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lin’s sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: The Land Of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Return Of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas’ pursuit.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father’s deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. When the two meet, they are entangled in the underworld of boxing gambling.

programme.title: The Voyage Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: One of the most far-out, fantastical films ever made in Chinese movie history, this pays tribute to the Japanese superhero trend in the 1970s. It tells the story of the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan, who is transformed from a young lab researcher to a superhero battling the crazy and ambitious monsters of the ice age.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li’s new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Gambler'S Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperor’s tomb.

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tian’s rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tian’s granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Return To The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of ‘scaffolding kung fu”.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Secret Service Of The Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the government’s secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperor’s ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin’s daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: A righteous swordsman, Bai Yi Pang, seeks revenge on an evil clan but is crippled after being beaten up by them. Years later, a young man encounters Bai who is hiding in a cave. Bai decides to teach this determined young man his Swift Sword skills so that he can help Bai take revenge on the evil clan.

programme.title: Unrelated
programme.desc: Starring Tom Hiddleston (Thor) and newcomer Kathryn Worth, Unrelated is a terse and gripping psychodrama that focuses on a childless Anna who’s dissatisfied with her marriage. She soon falls for another man but her demons soon return to haunt her.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Detective Durant: Young, Blonde & Dead
programme.desc: When the mutilated bodies of three girls are found, police affirm that a serial killer is on the loose. As part of investigations, Inspector Julia enters the world of the rich and mighty – where the killer might be closer to her than she’d ever imagine.

programme.title: One Floor Below
programme.desc: After being the sole unfortunate witness to a domestic quarrel that ends up in a murder, Patrascu finds himself at odds with two very close neighbours: one is the bizarre murderer. The other is his very own conscience.

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.

programme.title: The Girl With Nine Wigs
programme.desc: Sophie has just started her studies, but her life is turned upside down when she is diagnosed with cancer. However, her lust for life drives her to break free from her illness, and she does so with nine wigs, each bringing out an aspect of herself.

programme.title: Kill Pinochet
programme.desc: Three unlikely assassins dream of doing the impossible: kill Chilean dictator Augusto Pincochet. On a Sunday afternoon in 1986, a Physical Education teacher, a Psychologist Tamara, and a football enthusiast, sought to rewrite the future of Chile.

programme.title: What You Don't Know About Me
programme.desc: Ikendu, a Malian immigrant, falls in love with Patricia in an Italian-speaking town of Switzerland. When he is falsely accused of drug dealing by corrupt policemen, the couple’s relationship is put to the test as they discover each other’s secrets.

programme.title: LUV
programme.desc: Set in the Baltimore crime world, a fatherless eleven-year-old boy learns about adulthood when he spends a day with his ex-convict uncle whom he idolizes. He becomes witness to the ugliness of drug dealings and the haunting pain of past mistakes in life.

A traffic accident in which Camilla, a lawyer, is involved results in the death of a young man. This forces her to investigate and face unfamiliar places and situations. While on this journey, she will meet Bruno and rediscover herself.

programme.title: Kill Pinochet

programme.title: Detective Durant: Cold Blood
programme.desc: Detectives Julia and Felix arrive at a small village to investigate a murder. As investigations pick up, the residents remain strangely uncooperative and the duo soon discover that the idyllic place harbours an unfathomable evil secret.

programme.title: What You Don't Know About Me

programme.title: Real Guys
programme.desc: After a failed modelling stint, Jonas returns home penniless and to a son who doesn’t recognise him. When he’s offered the job to be a stripper, the fast cash attracts him. But how will he hide this embarrassing secret from his son and new love interest?

programme.title: Kids Run
programme.desc: Andi is a former boxer who now struggles as a day labourer. When he loses his job suddenly, he finds himself threatened with the loss of custody of his beloved three children. An amateur boxing competition with a huge prize money becomes his only hope.

programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet Özakinb narrowly survives a bomb blast in a café thanks to the intervention of his colleague Mustafa. With two key figures in the current case dead from the blast, and the official narrative not adding up, Mehmet suspects foul play.

programme.title: Paper Roof
programme.desc: A heart-warming insight of life through adolescent eyes – two young sisters run away from a dysfunctional home, with nothing but one another and a shared dream to live together in a cardboard house.

programme.desc: A true story. 14-year-old Hirut is on her way home when men on horses swoop in and kidnap her. She fought back but accidently killed her would-be husband. Tenacious young lawyer Meza’s decision to defend Hirut threatens not only her career but her life.

programme.desc: You Bake My Dreams Come True - In the season finale, the home bakers take on the most demanding bake of the entire competition - creating a sweet, delicious, show-stopping bakeshop display. One home baker will walk away with the $50, 000 grand prize.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S10 Ep114
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: A Single Shot
programme.desc: A single shot, aimed at a lone deer, hits and kills a young woman. Hunter John Moon watches the young woman die before discovering a box of money near her body. In a desperate panic, he takes the cash and attempts to cover up the killing.

programme.title: Curvature
programme.desc: A scientist must break into a top-secret facility in order to travel back in time and prevent a murder after receiving a mysterious phone call from herself.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Frenchness - Griff Rhys Jones continues his journey across Canada, heading to Quebec and Montreal to experience the French Canadian way of life, which includes sampling poutine, Maple syrup and the obsession with ice hockey.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Simon travels from Chile's Atacama Desert and follows the Andes mountains to Patagonia before ending up in the most southerly permanently inhabited region on earth, Tierra del Fuego.

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S6) Ep10
programme.desc: Tortilla chips - Gregg Wallace visits the biggest tortilla factory in Europe, while Cherry Healey takes on the hottest chilli in the world and Ruth Goodman reveals how the Elizabethans treated their ruff collars.

programme.title: Wild Metropolis (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Residents - Cities may seem unlikely havens for wildlife, but for animals able to adapt, the urban world is filled with opportunity. This first episode examines what it takes for wild animals to thrive in the fastest changing habitat on the planet.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S10) Ep7
programme.desc: Burdens of Winter - As the Arctic summer turns to fall and temperatures begin their decline, Alaskan ingenuity assists in securing materials for the coming freeze. To prepare for the winter ahead, bush-dwellers brave dangerous encounters with hungry predators.

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S7) Ep2
programme.desc: Trains - Gregg gets special access to learn how the ultimate train is made: a huge 187-tonne, five-carriage electric train. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey visits an HS2 construction site to learn how two huge tunnel boring machines are digging ten miles through the hills. And historian Ruth Goodman is energised by the history of electric trains.

programme.title: Equator From The Air (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Africa - In Africa, Gordon takes to the skies to see how a growing human population is affecting wildlife, from flamingos and elephants in Kenya, to humpback whales off the coast of Gabon.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Yorkshire - On a 15-mile walk in North Yorkshire, Kate sets off from the picturesque village of Robin Hood's Bay, heading towards Scarborough where a refreshing dip in the sea awaits her.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: See how Britain's National Gallery, The Tate, stepped in to help the Bankside on the southern shore of the River Thames.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Guinea Bissau - Robson travels to the remote island off the west coast of Africa for the Guinea Bissau Grand Slam, but he must get to grips with the extreme tides to have any chance of success.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape Ep2
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Frida the Jaguar Cub Ep1
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Punks on the Run Ep3
programme.desc: The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK pride’s territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Ava’s survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - A Capuchin’s Tale Ep1
programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - The Hummingbird’s Quest Ep2
programme.desc: From Colombia’s high plains of the Páramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - The Goby Effect Ep3
programme.desc: The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like it's finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - The Chobe River Ep6
programme.desc: Deep in southern Africa, a mighty river snakes through untamed wilderness. Its vast flood plains are a magnet for wildlife. In the dry season animals travel great distances to reach this oasis and during droughts space and resources are at a premium. But every animal has its place along the banks of the mighty Chobe river...

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Lady Elliot Island Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life Ep1
programme.desc: It’s spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape Ep2
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.desc: From Colombia’s high plains of the Páramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Endangered Species Ep5
programme.desc: With seven of Ontario’s eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow, which means they keep taking a beating from both predators and cars. Can they be saved?

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - The Damning Truth Ep6
programme.desc: A dam is an engineering feat, controlling massive amounts of water. But it can also wreak havoc on the animals that call those waters home.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Source to Sea Ep7
programme.desc: All rivers are on a quest, a constant mission to find the ocean, an endless cycle to move water across the vast blue planet. Along the way they support countless lives but their odyssey is by no means easy. From ice to heat, obstacles abound. Yet, despite an ever-changing nature, a river always finds its way - on the journey from Source to Sea.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Kangaroo Island Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Lola the Sea Lion Pup Ep2
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Punks Strike Back Ep4
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - A Capuchin’s Tale Ep1
programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - The Hummingbird’s Quest Ep2
programme.desc: From Colombia’s high plains of the Páramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Lola the Sea Lion Pup Ep2
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Punks Strike Back Ep4
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Indonesia - Life in the Muck Ep6
programme.desc: The waters surrounding Indonesia’s sprawling archipelago are home to the world’s richest reefs and the highest marine biodiversity on earth. Within this undersea Amazon, a hidden ecosystem goes unnoticed. Buried beneath a seabed littered with trash, a community of strange and fascinating creatures thrives against all odds. It is a place where predators and prey run an evolutionary arms race and develop ever-more unlikely ways of attack and defense. On this mucky seabed, nothing is as it seems. It is a place where fish can walk and even change colors.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Maldives - Paradise Shrinking Ep7
programme.desc: The Maldives, a low-lying archipelago in the Indian Ocean, faces an uncertain future. Rising sea levels threaten to wipe out this tiny island nation. As the water rises, researchers are using nature to help keep the Maldives from disappearing. They are rebuilding the reef that protects the islands and may keep the Maldives from disappearing into the ocean.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Creatures of the Night Ep7
programme.desc: Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know they’re not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Back from the Dead Ep8
programme.desc: Sometimes animals get a second chance. Like the majestic elk, which went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and over-aggressive hunting. But a few years ago, hundreds of elk were brought back, to re-populate the province in four different areas. Some floundered because of new, aggressive local predators. But a colony of elk in Burwash, on a former prison ground, is thriving.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Wetland Wonder Ep8
programme.desc: Southern Africa is gripped in a punishing drought. Across the region plants and animals are suffering. At times like this water becomes critical survival and wetlands become magnets for life. This film is a celebration of South Africa’s greatest wetland – Lake St Lucia.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Christmas Island Ep3
programme.desc: Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia’s mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and it’s stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Indonesia - Life in the Muck Ep6

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - A Place in the Wild Ep5
programme.desc: Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenya’s rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits Ep6
programme.desc: Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.

programme.desc: Lei Ying and David - Using virtual reality, architects Laura and Will compete to remodel a 1950s home in Belfast. Will the finished build give the family the space they desperately need?

programme.desc: Stacey Solomon transforms a multi-generational home with a mammoth declutter and clever upcycling hacks, including an office of dreams and DIY panelling for a cosy family snug.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: ICEHOTEL, Sweden - Giles and Monica have their best thermals and extreme weather gear, as they enter a world of snow, ice, blue and pink skies, 200km north of the Arctic Circle.

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Jamie kicks off Christmas with a range of delicious dishes to see us through the festive season. From crispy duck & noodles to short rib beef, veggie filo pie to decadent dessert, he's got simple no-fuss dishes to get everyone in the party spirit.

programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: The four remaining teams in this heat face chocolate week and a secret challenge, before making skyline-inspired towering chocolate showpieces and geometric chocolate tarts with moving parts.

programme.desc: After spending far too long in our houses, it's time for a supersized spring clean! programme.title: Nadiya's Food Adventure (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: London - Nadiya heads to London to discover cutting edge food, from salad 'fed' by fish poo to a chef using fragrance to flavour his food.

programme.desc: The three best teams from each heat join forces to face new rivals and more challenges. They make kouign-amann and soaked babas, before creating a skin-crawling sugar showpiece.

programme.desc: Rachel uncovers one of Melbourne's hidden secret day trips when she heads for the hills and explores the Dandenong region. She meets up with passionate Argentinian Chef Mauro from The Independent restaurant who she will cook alongside using locally caught golden trout.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep31
programme.desc: Egg's Day Out / The Way of the Snake - Archibald takes care of a lost egg for the day. But when the egg starts to crack, Archibald has to get the egg back to its parents. / After Archibald’s arms fall asleep, he joins a dojo ran by snakes and embraces a life without appendages.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep12
programme.desc: The Crood Who Knew Too Much / Scent Of A Thunk - When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep65
programme.desc: Welcome Back Otter - Abigail puts herself at risk to reunite an orphaned otter with his family. But the school veterinarian insists the animal will be safer at the zoo.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep10
programme.desc: The Great Brain Robbery / Can't Purr-y Love - A brain freeze inspires Melvin to make up for all of his wrongs! Lotta does everything she can to win over a little kitten.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep10
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck's Back - In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep31
programme.desc: Egg's Day Out / The Way of the Snake - Archibald takes care of a lost egg for the day. But when the egg starts to crack, Archibald has to get the egg back to its parents. / After Archibald’s arms fall asleep, he joins a dojo ran by snakes and embraces a life without appendages.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep10
programme.desc: Oh's Party Of Slumber / Paranoid Activity - Oh throws a slumber party to take his friendship game to the next level with Tip's classmates/Kyle will do whatever it takes to keep Oh accident-free.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep62
programme.desc: For Whom The Bell Gods Toll - King Julien accidentally blows himself up and must stand trial to be awarded a second chance; Mort battles Morticus Khan for control of the Mort army

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep22
programme.desc: Mumbai Dance Party - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard visit a fellow Wizard in Mumbai to take part in a big Bollywood dance number. But when Odlulu uses the Follow-the-Leader Key to lead all the dancers away in order to dance with her, it’s up to the Wanderers to get the key AND the dancers back

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep10
programme.desc: Remote Out of Control / Critter Comfort - Biggie takes Branchs superpowered remote but must return it before Branch finds outWhen Poppy builds a new home for a group of cute critters she accidentally attracts their predators.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep7
programme.desc: Naked Mole Wrath/Momma Leaf - The Mighty Ones think they are being menaced by a vicious mole rat, but it's a case of mistaken identity. / Leaf discovers eggs stuck to his body and enlists Twig's help so he can be a good momma.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep14
programme.desc: As the Diaper Changes - When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep62
programme.desc: Dances With Dingoes - A laid-back, festival-loving dingo emerges from the portal and teaches the orphans to boogie, but Puss soon learns the dance instructor has secret intentions

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep10
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter One - Eager to come face-to-face with a real life monster, Rocky and Bullwinkle buy a creepy old mansion in hopes of finding a real monster

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep62
programme.desc: No Dragon Left Behind - After being ambushed by aggressive Slitherwing dragons on a new island, the Riders think Stormfly has been poisoned and race to get an antidote

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep62
programme.desc: Heart of the Lion - When the Paladins learn about Sendak's six bases across the world, they plan an investigative mission to gain more intel

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy “moon”, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Olivia Ep25
programme.desc: Olivia And The Family Photo - Mother is determined to take the perfect family Christmas photo – in the middle of the summer. With the help of a snow machine, Olivia takes it upon herself to bring a little Christmas spirit to the photograph, and to Francine's backyard beach party next door.

programme.title: Olivia Ep26
programme.desc: Olivia Goes Camping - Francine comes along reluctantly on Olivia's family camping trip, and Olivia can't believe that anyone could be so unprepared for life in the great outdoors.
